title: BASE64 Decoder Function
description:
BASE64_DECODE_STREAM arbitrarily long BASE64 byte streams are

decoded. In one pass, up to 64 bytes are decoded, which in turn emerged

from a maximum of 48 bytes each. Here, the source data is passed to the

name: BASE64_DECODE_STREAM

input.name: SIZE1
input.description: Number of bytes in BUF1 for decode.

output.name: SIZE2
output.description: Number of bytes in BUF2 of the decoded results.

return_value.description: The function does not return a value; it outputs results via parameters.
